# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(easy-redis LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(easy-redis "")
set_target_properties(easy-redis PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "easy-redis")
set_target_properties(easy-redis PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/macosx/arm64/release")
target_compile_options(easy-redis PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-arch>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-arch>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:arm64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:arm64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-mmacosx-version-min=12.3>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-mmacosx-version-min=12.3>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-isysroot>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-isysroot>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX12.3.sdk>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX12.3.sdk>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
target_compile_features(easy-redis PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(easy-redis PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(easy-redis PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET easy-redis PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(easy-redis PRIVATE
    z
)
target_link_options(easy-redis PRIVATE
    -mmacosx-version-min=12.3
    -stdlib=libc++
)
target_sources(easy-redis PRIVATE
    src/eredis.cpp
    src/dbops.cpp
    src/erobject.cpp
    src/controller.cpp
    src/parser.cpp
    src/main.cpp
)
